players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "This is terrible! Bob was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who among us is the mafioso. Does anyone have any information or observations that might help us identify the killer?"
Diana: "I believe we should focus on finding the mafioso among us. Since Bob was killed last night, it's important that we discuss any suspicious behavior or patterns we've observed."

Charlie: "Alice's silence is concerning. In a situation where an innocent person has been killed, most townspeople would want to contribute to finding the mafioso. Her reluctance to speak makes me suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
